desc: Responsible for training, managing, and deploying unique AI (Computer Vision) models seamlessly into various client-specific business environment
Assumed the role of team leader during my manager's extended leave, overseeing team operations and ensuring continuous progress
Created an automated process enabling the Sales or Back Office team to initiate engine training simply by simply creating a specific Jira ticket without any assistance
Automated the validation and submission process for raw data to the voting system
Implemented automated analytical reports upon engine training completion, based on test results, to facilitate easy visualization and provide deeper insights into model performance
Developed tools to identify issues such as poor image quality, masking, and other factors that could negatively impact model performance
Resolved numerous bugs and enhanced existing features in the legacy codebase
Founding member of a global AI team, collaborating with AI/ML engineers and data scientists worldwide to foster consistent knowledge sharing and innovation
Responsible in writing clean code related to the application of DevExpress products into a client specific business environment
Was in charge of ASP.NET Web Forms, MVC, and Blazor support for DevExpress clients
Provided real-time client support on how to implement DevExpress Components in their projects
Created several use-case examples published on the DevExpress website, demonstrating practical applications of the platform
Resolved numerous bugs and enhanced existing features in the legacy codebase to improve functionality and stability
Works with DevExpress developers to find bugs, troubleshoot, and improve existing products
Was responsible for creating documentation for proper product implementation and troubleshooting procedures
Supervised all service operations of the company throughout the Philippines
Hands-on with both the assembly and troubleshooting of robots and other automation machines
Successfully managed projects that were delivered way ahead of schedule and under budget
Contributed to the mechanical/electrical design of most automation machines
Introduced several guidelines and created various tools using in-house materials to decrease production costs while increasing workflow efficiency

projects.title: AI Papers Implementations
projects.desc: List of AI papers I tried to implement so far: Multi-Head Attention Transformer - Attention Is All You Need, Generative Adversarial Network, Faster R-CNN: Towards Real-Time Object Detection with Region Proposal Networks

projects.title: Sign Language Translator
projects.desc: A simple model that will detect specific human actions with just a few samples for training. Intended to be used as a live sign language translator.

projects.title: Lifebuoy Carrying Quadcopter Drone
projects.desc: The following is one of our undergraduate project where we made a drone out of store-bought part. This drone was designed to carry and drop a lifebuoy near an active drowning victim where he/she can reach easily and where she can stay afloat while waiting for the rescuer to arrive.

projects.title: AI Language Translator
projects.desc: This project aims to train and use a multi-head attention transformer model to translate German text to English. Dataset that will be used in this implemenation is the Multi30k dataset. The model that will be used is the Multi-Head Self-Attention Transformer model I created from scratch.

projects.title: CopyCase Website
projects.desc: A website that automatically downloads specific Philippine legal case documents from the internet in a single click of a button.

projects.title: ImageNet Classification CNN Implementation
projects.desc: A simple implementation of the paper ImageNet Classification with Deep Convolutional Neural Networks using pytorch.
